newsitem.title: USA: Crown Laboratories Completes Stock Registration.
newsitem.headline: Crown Laboratories Completes Stock Registration.

text.p: Crown Laboratories Inc said the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has declared effective a registration statement for the sale of 3,453,748 shares of common stock.
These shares include 1,822,499 shares held by certain stockholders, including stockholders who acquired shares in a private placement that closed in July 1996.
The remaining 1,631,249 shares are reserved for issuance upon the exercise of certain warrants and options granted by the company in connection with the private placement and other transactions.
